OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Enrolls a learner into a program by creating records for program enrollment, benefit assignment, case, and task. If added to an assessment OmniScript, it associates the assessment with the program enrollment.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: EnrollInPgm

omniProcessElements.name: CreateBenefitAssignmentAndTask
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%GetAdvisingBenefit:benefitId% != NULL AND %CreateProgramEnrollment:ProgramEnrollment_1:Id% != NULL", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "benefitId" : "%GetAdvisingBenefit:benefitId%", "programEnrollmentId" : "%CreateProgramEnrollment:ProgramEnrollment_1:Id%", "userId" : "%userId%", "contactId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:ContactId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtCreateBenefitAsgntAndTask", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "label" : "DataRaptorPostAction2", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: CreateCaseAssociatedWithProgram
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%GetProgramDetails:programname% != NULL AND %GetProgramDetails:caseRecordType% != NULL AND %GetProgramDetails:caseId% == NULL AND %GetPortalUserDetails:AccountId% != NULL", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "contactId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:ContactId%", "accountId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:AccountId%", "recordTypeId" : "%GetProgramDetails:caseRecordType:id%", "subject" : "=%GetPortalUserDetails:FirstName% + \" \" + %GetPortalUserDetails:LastName% + \" - \" + %GetProgramDetails:caseRecordType:name% " }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtCreateCase", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "label" : "DataRaptorPostAction3", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: CreateProgramEnrollment
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:AccountId% != NULL", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "programId" : "%programId%", "contactId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:ContactId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtCreateProgramEnrl", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "label" : "DataRaptorPostAction1", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: GetAdvisingBenefit
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtGetAdvisingBenefit", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "inputParam" : "programId", "element" : "programId" } ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction3", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: GetPortalUserDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "DRFetchUserDetailsFromUserId", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "inputParam" : "UserId", "element" : "userId" } ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: GetProgramDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "contactId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:ContactId%", "programId" : "%programId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtGetProgramDetails", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction3", "disOnTplt" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: UpdateAssessment
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%assessmentId% != NULL AND %GetPortalUserDetails:AccountId% != NULL", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "assessmentId" : "%assessmentId%", "accountId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:AccountId%", "caseId" : "%SetCaseId:caseId%", "programEnrollmentId" : "%CreateProgramEnrollment:ProgramEnrollment_1:Id%", "contactId" : "%GetPortalUserDetails:ContactId%", "name" : "=%GetProgramDetails:programname% + \" Assessment\"" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "EDUProgramMgmtUpdateAssessment", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "label" : "DataRaptorPostAction4", "disOnTplt" : false }
